name: Lazy Bing
description:
Mr.Bing a lazy old drunkard is suffering from rare illness and needs hospitalization next morning. He can survive only one night and needs treatment. He needs 1000$ for his treatment and is running short of money. 

Help Mr.Bing by completing the tasks for which he will be rewarded with money. Each of the tasks contains 5 hidden objects to be found which will also be rewarded. For each hint money will be deducted.

He wont be able to walk continuously for more than 5 minutes and needs a chair to rest.
